summary: An email from Mark Epstein dated April 23, 2022, requesting the name and contact information for the person in charge of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death. The email asks if a specific individual (whose name is cut off) is still in charge and seeks their contact details.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.role: Email sender, relative of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The sender of the email, requesting contact information for the person leading the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: The subject of the death investigation that Mark Epstein is inquiring about.

connections.description: Mark Epstein is inquiring about the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death, indicating a familial or close associate relationship.

events.title: Investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's Death
events.description: Mark Epstein's email references an ongoing investigation into the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein, a relative of Jeffrey Epstein, was seeking contact information for the lead investigator into Jeffrey Epstein's death as of April 2022.
The email indicates the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death was still a subject of inquiry years after the event.
The recipient of the email and the specific investigator's name are not provided in the visible text.
